text: Flaviopolis (), or Phlaouiopolis, also known as Lora, was a town of ancient Lydia, inhabited during Roman times. Its site is located near Şahankaya in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Manisa Province
title: Flaviopolis (Lydia)
